parameters.functionCode: return [{ totalCostUSD: 0, costBudgetUSD: Number($vars.COST_LIMIT_USD_PER_DAY || $env.COST_LIMIT_USD_PER_DAY || 50), runBudgetUSD: Number($vars.COST_LIMIT_USD_PER_RUN || 20) }];

const url = $json.data && ($json.data.url || $json.data.image_url || $json.image_url) || $json.url || $json.logo_url_source;
return [{ logo_url_ready: url }];

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: ={{ [{ role: 'system', content: 'Scan 72h DE trends (Lifestyle/Freiheit/Online-Business). Return JSON with topics, examples, citations.' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Return citations true, DE focus, short-form relevance.' }] }}

parameters.name: q
parameters.value: Germany short form viral hooks hashtags

parameters.functionCode: const seen={};const out=[];for (const item of $items()){const key=(item.json.title||item.json.id||JSON.stringify(item.json)).slice(0,128);if(seen[key]) continue;seen[key]=1;out.push(item);}return out;

const thr = Number($vars.VIRAL_SCORE_THRESHOLD || $env.VIRAL_SCORE_THRESHOLD || 0.7);
return $items().filter(i=>Number(i.json.ViralScore||0) >= thr);

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: ={{ [{role:'user', content:`Create 10â€“20 3-beat story arcs and 3 hooks per arc (POV/Impossible/Humor/FOMO/Social Proof). Generate dynamic prompts for image/video/avatar/audio using prompts.yaml constraints. Camera preset: ${$json.camera_preset||'orbit_dolly_in_45deg_5s'}. Return JSON structured fields: arcs, hooks, runway_prompt, flux_image_prompt, portal_prompt.`}] }}

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: ={{ $json.flux_image_prompt || 'Ultra-realistic crystal/glass, black/gold, volumetric lighting, caustics, studio; LR logo reflection subtle; 4K master' }}

parameters.functionCode: function pickUrl(arr){if(!arr)return'';for(const it of arr){const j=it?.json||{};if(j.url)return j.url;if(j.image_url)return j.image_url;if(j.result_url)return j.result_url;}return '';}const leo=$items('m2_leonardo_glass_variations_01');const flux=$items('m2_flux_glass_variations_01');const biref=$items('m2_bg_remove_fal_birefnet_01');const leoUrl=pickUrl(leo);const fluxUrl=pickUrl(flux);const biUrl=pickUrl(biref);const best=leoUrl||fluxUrl||biUrl||$json.product_rgba_url||'';return [{ best_image_url: best }];

parameters.name: modifications
parameters.value: ={{ { logo_url: $json.logo_url_ready || $vars.LR_LOGO_URL, opacity: 0.35, position: 'bottom-right', mode: 'etched_glass', qr: (($vars.QR_IMAGE_URL || $json.qr_image_url) ? { url: ($vars.QR_IMAGE_URL || $json.qr_image_url), position: ($vars.QR_POSITION || 'top-right'), size: ($vars.QR_SIZE || '300x300') } : undefined) } }}

Return JSON: ideas[title, desc, prompt_modifiers].`}] }}

parameters.functionCode: const r = $items('m2_runway_portal_01')[0]?.json||{};const l=$items('m2_luma_portal_fallback_01')[0]?.json||{};const vid=r.video_url||r.output?.url||l.video_url||l.output?.url||'';return [{ source_video_url: vid }];

parameters.functionCode: const out = $json.final_video_url || $json.url || $json.output?.url || '';return [{ final_portal_url: out, hosting_provider: ($vars.CompositorApiUrl?'Compositor':'Bannerbear') }];

const weights = { engagement: Number($vars.ENGAGEMENT_W||0.45), recency: Number($vars.RECENCY_W||0.35), novelty: Number($vars.NOVELTY_W||0.2) };
return [{ dna_feedback: { suggestion: 'Increase camera push-in when lion eye visible', weights } }];

const t = Number($vars.AUDIO_TARGET_LUFS||-20);const a=$json||{};const lufs=Number(a.lufs||-20);const phase_ok=!!a.phase_ok;const binaural_ok=!!a.binaural_ok;const within=Math.abs(lufs - t) <= 2;const test=String($vars.TEST_MODE||$env.TEST_MODE||'').toLowerCase()==='true';if(!(within&&phase_ok&&binaural_ok)&&!test){throw new Error('Audio-QC failed');}return [{ qc:{ lufs, phase_ok, binaural_ok, within }}];

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: ={{ [{role:'user', content:`Scan last 72h DE viral trends for short-form (Lifestyle/Freiheit/Online-Business). Extract 10 hooks and 10 hashtag patterns brand-safe. Return JSON: {hooks:[], hashtags:[], trend_notes:[]}.`}] }}

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: ={{ [{role:'user', content:`Given trends (hooks, hashtags, notes), refine prompts for runway_prompt, flux_image_prompt, portal_prompt, and generate captions/ctas. Respect prompts.yaml constraints. Return JSON fields to merge.`}] }}

parameters.functionCode: return items;
